Quiz: Financial Health Quiz: Business Audit Insights Beyond the Inflection Point Contact Speak to An Advisor You Deserve a Pro Team Sean Heberling, Chief Executive Officer Sean helps founders and growth-stage companies secure capital and scale operations by combining Wall Street investment expertise with entrepreneurial insight, ensuring strategic alignment and investor readiness. Learn more… Andres A. Guevara, Associate Andres helps innovative businesses optimize their financial strategies, financial operations, and business development by leveraging data-driven analysis, a curated network of cross-industry experts, and behavioral finance principles to drive sustainable growth. Learn more… Kevin Eckenrode, Director of DataOps Kevin helps high-growth companies transform raw data into strategic assets by designing and implementing advanced analytics tools that enhance decision-making and operational performance. Learn more… Andrew (Drew) Tulchin, Director Drew helps mission-driven organizations and emerging enterprises identify and develop national and international growth opportunities by applying over 25 years of experience in international development finance and entrepreneurship. Learn more… Anthony Palladino, RevOps Advisor Anthony helps enterprise technology companies accelerate sustainable growth by building high-performing customer-facing teams, crafting go-to-market strategies, and scaling diverse partner ecosystems through over 20 years of RevOps leadership. Learn more… Eleanor Allen, Executive Consultant (CEO, Catapult for Change) Eleanor help organizations integrate justice, equity, diversity, and inclusion (JEDI) into their corporate culture and operations by drawing on global leadership experience in engineering, management consulting, and nonprofit sectors. Learn more… Richard Smith, Executive RevOps Consultant Richard Smith helps technology businesses in sectors like Property, Manufacturing, and Utilities expand into new markets by crafting and executing innovative business development strategies that drive growth and value. Learn more… Kevin Vrtaric, Executive Consultant Kevin helps startups and established companies enhance efficiency and profitability by leading cross-functional process improvements and implementing resilient business systems tailored to dynamic growth environments. Learn more… Let's Talk About Your Success We are dedicated to your success Email Address Sign Up Thank you! About Us | Second St. Restaurant Dialog window × This is a test Dialog window × Second St Bistro  757-234-4448 (Newport News)  /  757-220-2286 (Williamsburg) Home Menus Online Ordering About Locations Events Employment Sign Up Gift Cards Select Page About Us Our Story, Locations, Philosophy, Policies & More... Follow Follow Follow Us on Social Media! Williamsburg Follow Follow Follow Us on Social Media! Newport News Virtual Tour Williamsburg Step Inside Our Williamsburg Location! Take a virtual tour of our Williamsburg location exploring our restaurant’s lobby where you are greeted, the main dining room, the bar area, and our outdoor patio! It’s a great way to see the restaurant and decide where you want to sit and enjoy your next visit to our highly rated and “locals favorite” Williamsburg restaurant. We can’t wait to greet you in our lobby very soon! STEP INSIDE HOURS/LOCATION Virtual Tour Newport News Step Inside Our Newport News Location! Take a virtual tour of our Newport News location exploring our restaurant’s lobby where you are greeted, the main dining room, the bar area, and our outdoor patio! It’s a great way to see the restaurant and decide where you want to sit and enjoy your next visit to our highly rated and “locals favorite” Newport News restaurant. We can’t wait to greet you in our lobby very soon! STEP INSIDE HOURS/LOCATION Chef Long Featured on CBS Watch our famous Carolina Burger made from scratch LIVE! Our very own Chef Chris Long from Second Street Bistro in Williamsburg made his debut on the CBS This Morning show in their “Virginia This Morning” kitchen. Chef Long created our FAMOUS Carolina Burger made with homemade Pimento Cheese for the hosts and the viewing audience. Let’s just say it was a “towering” success! Enjoy the video and then COME ON IN to enjoy that incredible burger at either of our two locations! WATCH VIDEO Our Story It was March of 1985 when we, two brothers, John and Mickey Chohany, born and raised in Williamsburg, took over Second Street Restaurant. Today, over twenty five years later, we still have the same commitment to food and friendly service as we did when we first started serving customers. In 2007 Second Street went through an “Extreme Makeover” and emerged as a modern American Bistro in every sense of the word. From the rich and vibrant decor inside to the Al Fresco dining offered on our patio complete with fire pit, Koi pond, and relaxing water features we’ve created an upscale, casual, and very comfortable atmosphere for patrons. We are personally very active in our restaurants, ensuring that everyone’s experience from the moment you walk through our doors is one that you will share with family, friends, and business associates. We believe that you, our guest, are the reason we are in business – and not ever an interruption in our day. In 2010, 2011 and 2012 Second Street was the proud recipient of Wine Spectator magazine’s prestigious Award of Excellence . This award, from one of the world’s leading wine authorities, recognizes Second Street’s commitment to offering an outstanding selection of wine that pairs well with our menu and appeals to a wide range of wine lovers. In 2010 we officially started selling our very own Napa Valley grown Petite Sirah. It was a labor of love, inspired by our Hungarian heritage, that paid us back tremendously with our first award for our wine – a Gold Medal win at the 2011San Francisco Chronicle wine competition (America’s largest wine competition) and a rating of “Outstanding, 94pts” from Wine Spectator, which was the second highest rating EVER for a Petite Sirah! Visit the Aratas page on our website for more details. Fall of 2013 we opened our Newport News location featuring many of the same popular features as the Williamsburg location with a slightly different look and feel. Here you’ll find the same upbeat and modern decor, dedicated staff and fantastic menu as our flagship Williamsburg location. Both locations feature tastefully appointed bars with large flat screen TV’s, a great wine list with over 100 reasonably priced bottles, micro brew beers, cocktails, martinis, Happy Hour specials and access to our full menu. It’s a great place to gather, unwind, and meet people in the Williamsburg and Newport News areas. In 2014 we received the prestigious Certificate of Excellence from TripAdvisor. According to TripAdvisor, “The award celebrates hospitality excellence and is given only to establishments that consistently achieve outstanding traveler reviews on TripAdvisor. Winners of the Certificate of Excellence are located all over the world and represent the upper echelon of businesses listed on the website, with only the top 10 percent receiving the prestigious award.” We are, as you can imagine, very proud of this distinction and celebrate it wholeheartedly with our fantastic staff who make it happen on a daily basis! We look forward to showing YOU an ‘excellent’ experience! Though many things have changed in our community over the years we hope your experience at both Second Street, an American Bistro locations is welcoming, relaxing, and shows you what true Southern hospitality is all about. So sit back, relax, and enjoy your favorite food and drink. We’re here for you! Thank you for being our guests. John and Mickey Chohany Our Philosophy Delighting Our Guests We will strive to understand our guests’ needs by listening to their requirements and responding in a competent, accurate and timely fashion.  We will design and deliver our services and products to address their needs.  In fact, we are committed to exceeding their expectations by surprising them with our ability to anticipate and fulfill their wishes. Working Together We will emphasize the sharing of responsibility, accountability and recognition through a climate of teamwork.  By working together as a team and by treating each other with mutual respect and trust, we will all contribute to the Group’s overall success more productively than if we worked alone. Promoting a Climate of Enthusiasm We are committed to everyone at Second Street by providing a caring, motivating and rewarding environment.  We are committed to bringing out the best in our staff through effective training and meaningful career and personnel development, and by encouraging individuality and initiative. Being the Best We will strive to be an innovative leader in the restaurant industry and will continually improve our products and services.  We will seek from our suppliers the highest quality products and services at the best value. Playing by the Rules We will maintain integrity, fairness and honesty in both our internal and external relationships and will consistently live up to our commitments.  After all, “INTEGRITY IS DOING WHAT’S RIGHT WHEN NO ONE IS LOOKING.” Acting with Responsibility We will actively participate in the Williamsburg community and will be a responsible member by supporting the local community, businesses and charities. Our Award Winning Wine Aratas – founded on decades of experience. A premium collage of old world artisan oenology and new world viticulture, “Aratas” (pronounced Era-toss) , is the Napa Valley’s producer committed to the cultivation of single vineyard designate Petite Sirah. A noble vitis vinifera born from Syrah and Peloursin, Petite is hearty with history (circa 1884) and perseverance. One of the founding noble Fathers in America’s wine history, Heritage Petite Sirah links the most historic land in America- our vineyards in Napa Valley and our home near the first permanent English settlement of Jamestown at Williamsburg Va. The brand is a partnership founded on decades of experience in our country’s food and wine culture. Co-Proprietors, brothers John and Mickey Chohany, launched their first of many notable culinary endeavors; Second Street Restaurant an American Bistro in 1985 in the historic hamlet of Williamsburg, Virginia . Twenty five years later, led by Vintner Stephanie Douglas-Chohany the partners founded Aratas Wine and created the perfect pairing to complete their culinary vision. Aratas, by definition; a “harvest of gold” is named to honor the Chohany’s Hungarian heritage. The family is very selective and is devoted to producing exceptional vineyard designate wines uniting sustainable practices with state of the art vinification processes. Come for a taste then order award winning, highly rated Aratas Wine at Second Street or online for direct to your cellar delivery at www.AratasWine.com Notables: “Top Rhones of California” Wine Spectator “Best in the West” Sunset Magazine “Napa’s Legacy Grape” Wine Enthusiast Employment At Second Street an American Bistro, we pride ourselves in providing the finest quality food and service every day. We believe the only way you can maintain these high standards is to employ only the best personnel. If you sincerely believe you have the experience, character and dedication to join our team, please… DOWNLOAD the PDF Employment Application using the download button below FILL IT OUT electronically using Adobe Reader SAVE it to your desktop and RENAME it by adding your full name EMAIL it (along with your resume if you’d like) as follows: Williamsburg Location: EMAIL Newport News Location: EMAIL Both Locations (to apply to both): EMAIL Contact/Find Us Find our locations, hours of operation, give us a ring or drop us a line anytime. A member of our management team will reply. Contact/Locations Join Our Rewards Club! Receive special offers, invites to special events and menu updates from our private and secure E-mail club!
